name: Legend of Exalan Kingdom
description:
Controls

UPW / ↑DOWNS / ↓LEFTA / ←RIGHTD / →CONFIRM / INTERACTIONSPACE / ENTERDECLINE / BACKESC

Exalan Kingdom is endangered by portals in four elemental shrines because demons are coming through. You, a prince of this kingdom, have to channel your power through them, weakening yourself in order to close them. Be careful though, every time you close a portal, demons will become more impatient, making other shrines more dangerous.

IF YOU ARE HAVING TROUBLE: 

-next to your bed is a small chest, open it.

-look around the city, you might find something/somebody helpful

Have a great day

Made for JameGam October 2020
